snippet: India says its economy grew 7.3 percent in the last three months of 2015, putting the South Asian nation ahead of China’s 6.8 percent growth.
abstract: India reports economy grew 7.3 percent in last quarter of 2015, down from 7.4 percent in year-earlier period; latest figure puts country ahead of China, which in 2015 registered growth of 6.8 percent for same period.
lead_paragraph: India says its economy grew 7.3 percent in the last three months of 2015, putting the South Asian nation ahead of China’s 6.8 percent growth.

headline.main: India’s Economy Up 7.3% for Quarter, Surpassing China’s
headline.print_headline: Business Briefing; India’s Economy Up 7.3 Percent for Quarter, Surpassing China’s
